name: Fork Truck Challenge
description: Fork Truck Challenge is a game about moving cargo from point A to point B. Players test their accuracy skills to the limit by operating heavy lifting machinery. You gain points for successfully delivering cargo as fast as you can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
